Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(FriendsFrameBroadcastInput, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText(BN_BROADCAST_TOOLTIP, nil, nil, nil, nil, true);

Scripts.OnUpdate: -- need to update in case of alternate alphabet if ( self.hasBroadcast ) then FriendsFrameTooltip_Show(self.button); end

Scripts.OnShow: if ( UIFrameIsFlashing(self) ) then UIFrameFlashStop(self); end UIFrameFlash(self, 1, 0.5, 60, true, 1)
